parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The text content to animate. Supports markdown-like syntax for bold and italics.

parameters.name: [delay=0]
parameters.description: The delay in seconds before the animation starts.

parameters.name: [highlight=background]
parameters.description: The highlight style to apply to emphasized text.

parameters.name: [onTrigger]
parameters.description: Custom function to trigger the animation (only used when trigger='custom').

parameters.name: [key]
parameters.description: Key prop passed from parent to force re-render.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The text content to animate. Supports markdown-like syntax for bold and italics.

parameters.name: [delay=0]
parameters.description: The delay in seconds before the animation starts.

examples.title: Character Text Animation
examples.code:
<TextAnimChar
content="A __modular__, __themable__ website template for __Designers__, __Developers__ and __Agencies__."
delay={0}
/>
/

parameters.name: post.slug
parameters.description: The slug for the post URL.

parameters.name: post.client
parameters.description: The client name for the project.

parameters.name: post.tags
parameters.description: An array of tags for the post.

parameters.name: post.img
parameters.description: The image object for the post.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index of the post, used for animation delay.

examples.title: Case Study Post Tile
examples.code:
<PostTileCs
post={{
title: "Project Title",
subtitle: "A brief description of the project",
slug: "project-slug",
client: "Client Name",
date: "January 2023",
tags: ["Web Design", "Development"],
img: {
url: "https://example.com/image.jpg",
width: 800,
height: 600,
description: "Project cover image"
}
}}
index={0}
/>
/

parameters.name: post.slug
parameters.description: The slug for the post URL.

parameters.name: post.client
parameters.description: The client name for the project.

parameters.name: post.tags
parameters.description: An array of tags for the post.

parameters.name: post.img
parameters.description: The image object for the post.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index of the post, used for animation delay.

parameters.name: post.slug
parameters.description: The slug for the post URL.

parameters.name: post.color
parameters.description: The accent color for the tile.

parameters.name: post.img
parameters.description: The image object for the post.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index of the post, used for animation delay.

examples.title: Image Post Tile
examples.code:
<PostTileImg
post={{
title: "Project Title",
subtitle: "A brief description of the project",
slug: "project-slug",
color: "var(--accent)",
img: {
url: "https://example.com/image.jpg",
width: 800,
height: 600,
description: "Project cover image"
}
}}
index={0}
/>
/

parameters.name: post.slug

parameters.name: [layout]
parameters.description: The layout style of the tile.
